New Records: Jarren Duran is chasing prestigious Red Sox history for most XBH as a leadoff hitter in a season, currently at 75, behind Nomar Garciaparra's record of 85 in 1997
Key Match Events: The Boston Red Sox beat the Detroit Tigers 7-5 in extra-innings on Friday night at Comerica Park
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox remain 3.5 games back of the third and final wild card spot in the American League after the victory
Others: Jarren Duran went 3-for-5 with two doubles and a home run, and is hitting.295 this season
